category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: Plant.Template.Cloning
preference.preference_description: Defines the action rules used in creating a plant from a plant template. Plant templates are available from Manufacturing Process Planner, Part Planner, and Plant Designer. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter naming rule. Naming rules are created in Business Modeler IDE.
